definition: capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word
warm/lukewarm/temperature/to warm up/mild/soft/tender/to review (a lesson etc)/fever (TCM)/old variant of 瘟[wen1]

sentences.english: Temperature taking is intrusive and will upset the child.
sentences.chinese: 測量體溫是對小兒煩擾，會使小兒不安。

sentences.english: Continue to hold the thermometer in place while taking his temperature.
sentences.chinese: 量體溫的過程中要一直拿住體溫計。

sentences.english: Open your mouth, dear. We're going to take your temperature.
sentences.chinese: 張開嘴，親愛的，我幫你量一量體溫。

sentences.english: Let me feel her pulse, and take her temperature.
sentences.chinese: 我來給她把脈和量體溫。

sentences.english: A thermometer is defined as an apparatus which measures the temperature of the body.
sentences.chinese: 體溫講可以定義爲一種測量體溫的儀器。

sentences.english: What Japan is doing is they are making everyone take a temperature when they get off the airplane, " she said.
sentences.chinese: 日本的做法是，他們讓所有下飛機的乘客量體溫。

sentences.english: That's how my mom took my temperature when I was a child.
sentences.chinese: 而老媽在我小時候就是這樣幫我量體溫。

sentences.english: Let me have your temperature, put this thermometer under your armpit.
sentences.chinese: 我給你量體溫，把溫度計放到腋窩下。

sentences.english: Let me take your temperature. Would you put the thermometer under your arm. Please?
sentences.chinese: 我來給你量量體溫，請把體溫表放在腋下。

sentences.english: I didn't take my temperature, but I felt feverish.
sentences.chinese: 我沒有量體溫，但我感覺有點發燒。

sentences.english: Take your child's temperature with easy with this 1-Second Ear Thermometer.
sentences.chinese: 一秒耳溫計可簡單快速幫助寶寶測量體溫。

sentences.english: Let me take your temperature. Would you put the thermometer under your arm.
sentences.chinese: 我來給你量量體溫，請把體溫表放在腋下。

sentences.english: Advise staff to measure body temperature before coming to work.
sentences.chinese: 建議員工在上班前先測量體溫。

sentences.english: Let me put this into your mouth and take your temperature.
sentences.chinese: 我把這放到你嘴裏，給你量量體溫。

sentences.english: Here introduces how to design infrared ear thermometer.
sentences.chinese: 很多情況下，需要用紅外耳溫計迅速測量體溫。
